content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":263752,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tなにバカいっているの","translatedEnglishLine":"What nonsense are you talking about?"},{"lineNumber":263753,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tてな感じで汎用女の子にエロ","translatedEnglishLine":"And like that, I tried something erotic with a generic girl."},{"lineNumber":263754,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t当然おきない","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course, nothing happened."},{"lineNumber":263755,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t※イベントＣＧを使うかは保留","translatedEnglishLine":"* Whether to use the event CG is undecided."},{"lineNumber":263756,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tてな事をしていると砦に魔軍が攻めてきた","translatedEnglishLine":"While doing that, the demon army attacked the fortress."},{"lineNumber":263757,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその数、数百、ランス達で撃退するには敵が多すぎる","translatedEnglishLine":"Their number, several hundreds; too many enemies for Rance and the others to repel."},{"lineNumber":263758,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tいったん撤退が１番だが、ここで撤退すると無防備に寝ている奴らが皆殺しあってしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Retreating for now is best, but if they retreat here, those sleeping defenselessly will be slaughtered."},{"lineNumber":263759,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t唯一起きていた兵士は行って下さい、総統は人類の希望です、こんな所で死んでは駄目です","translatedEnglishLine":"The only awake soldier says: Please go; the Supreme Commander is humanity's hope. You must not die here."},{"lineNumber":263760,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tぼくは残ります、ここで仲間を守って・・せめて一緒に死にます","translatedEnglishLine":"I will stay behind, protect my comrades here... and at least die together."},{"lineNumber":263761,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":263762,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞　魔軍を迎撃する","translatedEnglishLine":"> Intercept the demon army"},{"lineNumber":263763,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞　お言葉に甘えて撤退する","translatedEnglishLine":"> Gratefully accept and retreat"},{"lineNumber":263764,"originalJapaneseLine":"上記、迎撃を選択した時の台詞","translatedEnglishLine":"Dialogue when choosing to intercept above."},{"lineNumber":263765,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは部隊を率いて無数の魔軍に立ち向かっていった","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance led his troops and confronted the countless demon army."},{"lineNumber":263766,"originalJapaneseLine":"上記、撤退を選んだ時の台詞","translatedEnglishLine":"Dialogue when choosing to retreat above."},{"lineNumber":263767,"originalJapaneseLine":"わるいなと兵士を置いて立ち去る","translatedEnglishLine":"He leaves the soldiers behind saying sorry."},{"lineNumber":263768,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が立ち去り少し離れた所から見ていると","translatedEnglishLine":"Watching from a short distance after Rance and the others left,"},{"lineNumber":263769,"originalJapaneseLine":"砦に魔物が取り付いていた","translatedEnglishLine":"monsters were attaching themselves to the fortress."},{"lineNumber":263770,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞魔物隊長との戦闘後","translatedEnglishLine":"> After the battle with the monster captain"},{"lineNumber":263771,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵が、小数なのにこいつら強い、無理だと","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster soldiers say, although few in number, these guys are strong; it's impossible."},{"lineNumber":263772,"originalJapaneseLine":"逃げていきますか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Should we run away?"},{"lineNumber":263773,"originalJapaneseLine":"がはははは、俺様は強い","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha, I am strong!"},{"lineNumber":263774,"originalJapaneseLine":"砦からさきほどの生き残りが来てお礼を言う","translatedEnglishLine":"A survivor from the fortress came and thanked us."},{"lineNumber":263775,"originalJapaneseLine":"可愛い子もいるからな、お前がちゃんとあの砦を守れ。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are cute girls too, so make sure to properly protect that fortress."},{"lineNumber":263776,"originalJapaneseLine":"いつか俺が元に戻してやる","translatedEnglishLine":"Someday, I'll restore it back."},{"lineNumber":263777,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ・・可愛い子に手をだすなよ、あれは俺のだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... don't lay a hand on the cute girls; they're mine."},{"lineNumber":263778,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t無事な村に着く、村人と会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Arriving at the safe village, talking with villagers."},{"lineNumber":263779,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今日はもう遅いのでここに泊まる事にする","translatedEnglishLine":"It's already late today, so we'll stay here overnight."},{"lineNumber":263780,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t夜、宿泊中の一時、シィルとかの会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Nighttime, during lodging, a conversation with Seel and others."},{"lineNumber":263781,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそろそろエッチでもして寝ようかという時","translatedEnglishLine":"Just about the time to have some sex and then go to sleep."},{"lineNumber":263782,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tかなみあたりが現れる、少し眠そう・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami or someone shows up, looking a bit sleepy..."},{"lineNumber":263783,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ワーグが現れた、本体は見てないけど情報から分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Warg appeared; we haven't seen the main body, but can tell from the information."},{"lineNumber":263784,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t村人がどんどん倒れている、みんな眠っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Villagers are collapsing one after another; everyone is asleep."},{"lineNumber":263785,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t私も、なんとかふとももをつねりながら耐えている","translatedEnglishLine":"I am also somehow enduring by pinching my thighs."},{"lineNumber":263786,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t村の西の方だな、よし向かおう","translatedEnglishLine":"It's towards the western side of the village, alright let's head there."},{"lineNumber":263787,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tやめたおいた方がいいと誰かの助言、危険だから逃げようと","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone advises to stop, saying it's dangerous and to escape."},{"lineNumber":263788,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Choice"},{"lineNumber":263789,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞　ワーグに近寄る","translatedEnglishLine":"> Approach Warg"},{"lineNumber":263790,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞　ワーグかに離れる","translatedEnglishLine":"> Move away from Warg"},{"lineNumber":263791,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tうむ・・対策がないな、やっぱり撤退する","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... there's no countermeasure, so we will retreat after all."},{"lineNumber":263792,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスの率いる魔人討伐隊は撤収した","translatedEnglishLine":"The Anti-Demon squad led by Rance withdrew."},{"lineNumber":263793,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tよし、近寄るぞ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's get closer..."},{"lineNumber":263794,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tワーグちゃんまってろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait for me, Warg-chan."},{"lineNumber":263795,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t根性があれば眠らない、みんな根性みせろー","translatedEnglishLine":"If you have guts, you won't fall asleep. Everyone, show your spirit!"},{"lineNumber":263796,"originalJapaneseLine":"村の中の進むランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the group progress through the village."},{"lineNumber":263797,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぱたりと仲間が倒れる、くーくーと寝てしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, comrades fall down, snoozing soundly."},{"lineNumber":263798,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ、なんだ、他にも数名が同じように倒れていった","translatedEnglishLine":"What? Several others also fell down like that."},{"lineNumber":263799,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス、サテラ、眠いががんばっている・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, Satella, sleepy but doing their best..."},{"lineNumber":263800,"originalJapaneseLine":"討伐隊での戦闘経験が少ない者から倒れたようだな（これヒント）","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems those with little combat experience in the subjugation team fell first (this is a hint)."},{"lineNumber":263801,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰々が倒れたかは分からない、部隊編成を確認しておいた方がいいぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"We don't know who fell; better check the team formation."},{"lineNumber":263802,"originalJapaneseLine":"村の中の進むランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the group continue moving in the village."},{"lineNumber":263803,"originalJapaneseLine":"ばたりとまた仲間が倒れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Another comrade suddenly falls down."},{"lineNumber":263804,"originalJapaneseLine":"他にも数名が倒れれていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Several others are also collapsing."},{"lineNumber":263805,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむむ、みんな根性無いぞ・・といいつつランスとサテラも眠い","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, nobody has the spirit... though Rance and Satella are also sleepy."},{"lineNumber":263806,"originalJapaneseLine":"この先に魔人ワーグがいるのは確実なのだがんばれ","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s certain that demon Warg is ahead, so do your best."},{"lineNumber":263807,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ・・それから、倒れた馬鹿は誰か確認の為に部隊編成も再度しなくては・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... also, we need to check the team formation again to identify who the fallen idiots are."},{"lineNumber":263808,"originalJapaneseLine":"さらに進んだ裏路地、そこに女の子が一人立っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Further ahead in a back alley, a girl was standing alone."},{"lineNumber":263809,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスがいう、あいつが魔人だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos says, that one is the demon."},{"lineNumber":263810,"originalJapaneseLine":"ばたん、ばたん、また仲間が倒れる・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Thud, thud, another comrade falls..."},{"lineNumber":263811,"originalJapaneseLine":"ワーグが何か話をする、まだ寝ないの・・すごい、でも・・それなら倒すしかない","translatedEnglishLine":"Warg says something: You still haven't fallen asleep... amazing, but... if so, we have no choice but to defeat it."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにバカいっているの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What nonsense are you talking about?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じで汎用女の子にエロ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And like that, I tried something erotic with a generic girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当然おきない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, nothing happened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※イベントＣＧを使うかは保留
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Whether to use the event CG is undecided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな事をしていると砦に魔軍が攻めてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While doing that, the demon army attacked the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その数、数百、ランス達で撃退するには敵が多すぎる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their number, several hundreds; too many enemies for Rance and the others to repel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったん撤退が１番だが、ここで撤退すると無防備に寝ている奴らが皆殺しあってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Retreating for now is best, but if they retreat here, those sleeping defenselessly will be slaughtered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 唯一起きていた兵士は行って下さい、総統は人類の希望です、こんな所で死んでは駄目です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only awake soldier says: Please go; the Supreme Commander is humanity's hope. You must not die here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼくは残ります、ここで仲間を守って・・せめて一緒に死にます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will stay behind, protect my comrades here... and at least die together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　魔軍を迎撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Intercept the demon army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　お言葉に甘えて撤退する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Gratefully accept and retreat

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上記、迎撃を選択した時の台詞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dialogue when choosing to intercept above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは部隊を率いて無数の魔軍に立ち向かっていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance led his troops and confronted the countless demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上記、撤退を選んだ時の台詞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dialogue when choosing to retreat above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わるいなと兵士を置いて立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He leaves the soldiers behind saying sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が立ち去り少し離れた所から見ていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching from a short distance after Rance and the others left,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦に魔物が取り付いていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: monsters were attaching themselves to the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞魔物隊長との戦闘後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > After the battle with the monster captain

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵が、小数なのにこいつら強い、無理だと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster soldiers say, although few in number, these guys are strong; it's impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げていきますか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Should we run away?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、俺様は強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, I am strong!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦からさきほどの生き残りが来てお礼を言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A survivor from the fortress came and thanked us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可愛い子もいるからな、お前がちゃんとあの砦を守れ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are cute girls too, so make sure to properly protect that fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつか俺が元に戻してやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someday, I'll restore it back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・可愛い子に手をだすなよ、あれは俺のだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... don't lay a hand on the cute girls; they're mine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事な村に着く、村人と会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving at the safe village, talking with villagers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はもう遅いのでここに泊まる事にする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's already late today, so we'll stay here overnight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、宿泊中の一時、シィルとかの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nighttime, during lodging, a conversation with Seel and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろエッチでもして寝ようかという時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just about the time to have some sex and then go to sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみあたりが現れる、少し眠そう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami or someone shows up, looking a bit sleepy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ワーグが現れた、本体は見てないけど情報から分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Warg appeared; we haven't seen the main body, but can tell from the information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人がどんどん倒れている、みんな眠っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Villagers are collapsing one after another; everyone is asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も、なんとかふとももをつねりながら耐えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am also somehow enduring by pinching my thighs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の西の方だな、よし向かおう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's towards the western side of the village, alright let's head there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やめたおいた方がいいと誰かの助言、危険だから逃げようと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone advises to stop, saying it's dangerous and to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ワーグに近寄る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Approach Warg

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ワーグかに離れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Move away from Warg

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ・・対策がないな、やっぱり撤退する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... there's no countermeasure, so we will retreat after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの率いる魔人討伐隊は撤収した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Anti-Demon squad led by Rance withdrew.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、近寄るぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's get closer...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグちゃんまってろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait for me, Warg-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 根性があれば眠らない、みんな根性みせろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you have guts, you won't fall asleep. Everyone, show your spirit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の中の進むランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the group progress through the village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱたりと仲間が倒れる、くーくーと寝てしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, comrades fall down, snoozing soundly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、なんだ、他にも数名が同じように倒れていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? Several others also fell down like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、サテラ、眠いががんばっている・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, Satella, sleepy but doing their best...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 討伐隊での戦闘経験が少ない者から倒れたようだな（これヒント）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems those with little combat experience in the subjugation team fell first (this is a hint).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰々が倒れたかは分からない、部隊編成を確認しておいた方がいいぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't know who fell; better check the team formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の中の進むランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the group continue moving in the village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばたりとまた仲間が倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Another comrade suddenly falls down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他にも数名が倒れれていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several others are also collapsing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむ、みんな根性無いぞ・・といいつつランスとサテラも眠い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, nobody has the spirit... though Rance and Satella are also sleepy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この先に魔人ワーグがいるのは確実なのだがんばれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s certain that demon Warg is ahead, so do your best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・それから、倒れた馬鹿は誰か確認の為に部隊編成も再度しなくては・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... also, we need to check the team formation again to identify who the fallen idiots are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに進んだ裏路地、そこに女の子が一人立っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Further ahead in a back alley, a girl was standing alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスがいう、あいつが魔人だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says, that one is the demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばたん、ばたん、また仲間が倒れる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thud, thud, another comrade falls...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグが何か話をする、まだ寝ないの・・すごい、でも・・それなら倒すしかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Warg says something: You still haven't fallen asleep... amazing, but... if so, we have no choice but to defeat it.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにバカいっているの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What nonsense are you talking about?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じで汎用女の子にエロ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And like that, I tried something erotic with a generic girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当然おきない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, nothing happened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※イベントＣＧを使うかは保留
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * Whether to use the event CG is undecided.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな事をしていると砦に魔軍が攻めてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While doing that, the demon army attacked the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その数、数百、ランス達で撃退するには敵が多すぎる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their number, several hundreds; too many enemies for Rance and the others to repel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったん撤退が１番だが、ここで撤退すると無防備に寝ている奴らが皆殺しあってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Retreating for now is best, but if they retreat here, those sleeping defenselessly will be slaughtered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 唯一起きていた兵士は行って下さい、総統は人類の希望です、こんな所で死んでは駄目です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only awake soldier says: Please go; the Supreme Commander is humanity's hope. You must not die here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼくは残ります、ここで仲間を守って・・せめて一緒に死にます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will stay behind, protect my comrades here... and at least die together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　魔軍を迎撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Intercept the demon army

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　お言葉に甘えて撤退する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Gratefully accept and retreat

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上記、迎撃を選択した時の台詞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dialogue when choosing to intercept above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは部隊を率いて無数の魔軍に立ち向かっていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance led his troops and confronted the countless demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上記、撤退を選んだ時の台詞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dialogue when choosing to retreat above.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わるいなと兵士を置いて立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He leaves the soldiers behind saying sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が立ち去り少し離れた所から見ていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching from a short distance after Rance and the others left,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦に魔物が取り付いていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: monsters were attaching themselves to the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞魔物隊長との戦闘後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > After the battle with the monster captain

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵が、小数なのにこいつら強い、無理だと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster soldiers say, although few in number, these guys are strong; it's impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げていきますか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Should we run away?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、俺様は強い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, I am strong!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦からさきほどの生き残りが来てお礼を言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A survivor from the fortress came and thanked us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可愛い子もいるからな、お前がちゃんとあの砦を守れ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are cute girls too, so make sure to properly protect that fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつか俺が元に戻してやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someday, I'll restore it back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・可愛い子に手をだすなよ、あれは俺のだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... don't lay a hand on the cute girls; they're mine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無事な村に着く、村人と会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving at the safe village, talking with villagers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はもう遅いのでここに泊まる事にする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's already late today, so we'll stay here overnight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、宿泊中の一時、シィルとかの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nighttime, during lodging, a conversation with Seel and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろエッチでもして寝ようかという時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just about the time to have some sex and then go to sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみあたりが現れる、少し眠そう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami or someone shows up, looking a bit sleepy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ワーグが現れた、本体は見てないけど情報から分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Warg appeared; we haven't seen the main body, but can tell from the information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人がどんどん倒れている、みんな眠っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Villagers are collapsing one after another; everyone is asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も、なんとかふとももをつねりながら耐えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am also somehow enduring by pinching my thighs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の西の方だな、よし向かおう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's towards the western side of the village, alright let's head there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やめたおいた方がいいと誰かの助言、危険だから逃げようと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone advises to stop, saying it's dangerous and to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ワーグに近寄る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Approach Warg

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　ワーグかに離れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Move away from Warg

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ・・対策がないな、やっぱり撤退する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... there's no countermeasure, so we will retreat after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの率いる魔人討伐隊は撤収した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Anti-Demon squad led by Rance withdrew.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、近寄るぞ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's get closer...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグちゃんまってろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait for me, Warg-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 根性があれば眠らない、みんな根性みせろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you have guts, you won't fall asleep. Everyone, show your spirit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の中の進むランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the group progress through the village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱたりと仲間が倒れる、くーくーと寝てしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, comrades fall down, snoozing soundly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、なんだ、他にも数名が同じように倒れていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? Several others also fell down like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、サテラ、眠いががんばっている・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, Satella, sleepy but doing their best...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 討伐隊での戦闘経験が少ない者から倒れたようだな（これヒント）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems those with little combat experience in the subjugation team fell first (this is a hint).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰々が倒れたかは分からない、部隊編成を確認しておいた方がいいぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't know who fell; better check the team formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の中の進むランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the group continue moving in the village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばたりとまた仲間が倒れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Another comrade suddenly falls down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他にも数名が倒れれていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several others are also collapsing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむむ、みんな根性無いぞ・・といいつつランスとサテラも眠い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, nobody has the spirit... though Rance and Satella are also sleepy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この先に魔人ワーグがいるのは確実なのだがんばれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s certain that demon Warg is ahead, so do your best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・それから、倒れた馬鹿は誰か確認の為に部隊編成も再度しなくては・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... also, we need to check the team formation again to identify who the fallen idiots are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに進んだ裏路地、そこに女の子が一人立っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Further ahead in a back alley, a girl was standing alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスがいう、あいつが魔人だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos says, that one is the demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばたん、ばたん、また仲間が倒れる・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thud, thud, another comrade falls...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワーグが何か話をする、まだ寝ないの・・すごい、でも・・それなら倒すしかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Warg says something: You still haven't fallen asleep... amazing, but... if so, we have no choice but to defeat it.
